name: Apple iPhone 6s (Space Grey)(32 GB)
snippet: iPhone 6s features a 12MP camera with 4K video at 30 fps. A 4.7-inch Retina HD display with 3D Touch. A9 chip. Long battery life. And iOS 12—the most advanced mobile operating system—with powerful new tools that make iPhone more personal than ever.

name: Apple iPhone Xs (32GB) - Gold
snippet: iPhone Xs features a 12MP camera with 4K video at 30 fps. A 4.7-inch Retina HD display with 3D Touch. A9 chip. Long battery life. And iOS 12—the most advanced mobile operating system—with powerful new tools that make iPhone more personal than ever.
